remarks: Left operation by a constant.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
statement:
ofc1.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ofc1.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
ofc1.3 $e |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) $.
ofc1.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ X e. A ) -> ( F ` X ) = C ) $.
ofc1 $p |- ( ( ph /\ X e. A ) -> ( ( ( A X. { B } ) oF R F ) ` X ) = ( B R C ) ) $.
